name: request-termination
hubDesc: Terminates all requests with a specific response
description: This plugin terminates incoming requests with a specified status code and message. This allows to (temporarily) stop traffic on a Service or a Route, or even block a Consumer.

fields.name: message
fields.help: The message to send, if using the default response generator.

fields.name: body
fields.help: The raw response body to send, this is mutually exclusive with the config.message field.

fields.name: content_type
fields.help: Content type of the raw response configured with config.body.
